languages.text: {n}Рана в реальности затягивается, и морок стремительно развеивается. Вы ловите последние ее слова:{/n} "Что бы ты ни выбрал{mf||а}, надеюсь, тебе повезет больше, чем мне".
{n}The wound on reality is healed and the vision of Theodora quickly fades away. You catch her last words:{/n} "Whatever fate you choose, one can only hope it will be better than mine."
languages.original_text: {n}Рана в реальности затягивается, и морок стремительно развеивается. Вы ловите последние ее слова:{/n} "Что бы ты ни выбрал{mf||а}, надеюсь, тебе повезет больше, чем мне".

traits.locale_text: {n}The reality's wound is healed, and the darkness quickly fades away. You can hear her last words:{/n} "I hope that you will be more lucky than I was, no matter what you will choose."
{n}The reality's wound is healed, and the darkness quickly fades away. You can hear her last words:{/n} "I hope that you will be more lucky than I was, no matter what you will choose."
{n}The reality's wound is healed and the darkness quickly fades away. You can hear her utter her last words:{/n} "I hope you will be more lucky than I was, no matter what you choose."
{n}The reality's wound is healed and the darkness quickly fades away. You can hear her utter her last words:{/n} "I hope you will be more lucky than I was, no matter what you choose."
{n}The wound on reality is healed and the vision of Theodora quickly fades away. You catch her last words:{/n} "Whatever fate you choose, one can only hope it will be better than mine."
{n}The wound on reality is healed and the vision of Theodora quickly fades away. You catch her last words:{/n} "Whatever fate you choose, one can only hope it will be better than mine."

languages.text: {n}La plaie de la réalité est soignée et les visions de Théodora s'estompent rapidement. Vous parvenez à entendre ses derniers mots :{/n} « Quel que soit le destin que vous choisissiez, j'espère qu'il sera meilleur que le mien. »
languages.original_text: {n}The wound on reality is healed and the vision of Theodora quickly fades away. You catch her last words:{/n} "Whatever fate you choose, one can only hope it will be better than mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}La plaie de la réalité est soignée et les visions de Théodora s'estompent rapidement. Vous parvenez à entendre ses derniers mots :{/n} « Quel que soit le destin que vous choisissiez, j'espère qu'il sera meilleur que le mien. »

languages.text: {n}La herida de la realidad se ha cerrado y la visión de Theodora no tarda en desvanecerse. Puedes oír las últimas palabras que murmura:{/n} «Espero que tengas más suerte que yo, tomes la decisión que tomes».
languages.original_text: {n}The wound on reality is healed and the vision of Theodora quickly fades away. You catch her last words:{/n} "Whatever fate you choose, one can only hope it will be better than mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}La herida de la realidad se ha cerrado y la oscuridad no tarda en aclararse. Puedes oír las últimas palabras que murmura:{/n} «Espero que tengas más suerte que yo, tomes la decisión que tomes».

languages.text: {n}现实的创伤愈合了，西奥多拉的幻象很快消失了。她最后的话传到了你的耳中。{/n}“无论你做出怎样的选择，我都希望你的选择比我的更好。”
languages.original_text: {n}The wound on reality is healed and the vision of Theodora quickly fades away. You catch her last words:{/n} "Whatever fate you choose, one can only hope it will be better than mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}现实的创伤愈合了，眼前的黑暗很快消失了。她最后的话传到了你的耳中。{/n}“无论你做出怎样的选择，我都希望你比我更幸运。”

languages.text: {n}Die Wunde der Realität ist geheilt und die Vision von Theodora verblasst. Du hörst noch ihre letzten Worte:{/n}" Egal, welches Schicksal du wählst, ich kann nur hoffen, es wird besser als meines sein."
languages.original_text: {n}The wound on reality is healed and the vision of Theodora quickly fades away. You catch her last words:{/n} "Whatever fate you choose, one can only hope it will be better than mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Wunde der Realität ist geheilt, die Dunkelheit verschwindet schnell. Du hörst sie ihre letzten Worte sagen:{/n} "Ich hoffe, Ihr habt mehr Glück als ich. Was Ihr auch wählt."

languages.text: {n}現実の傷は癒え、シオドーラの幻影が急速に消えていく。彼女の最後の言葉が聞こえる。{/n}「あなたがどんな運命を選ぶにせよ、まあ、私よりマシな運命であることを願うよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The wound on reality is healed and the vision of Theodora quickly fades away. You catch her last words:{/n} "Whatever fate you choose, one can only hope it will be better than mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}現実の傷は癒え、闇は急速に消えていく。彼女の最後の言葉が聞こえる。{/n}「あなたが何を選ぶにせよ、私よりも幸運であることを願うわ」
